name: I want to add a .env file and I want ind...

joules.message: I want to add a .env file and I want index.js to import the env using the dotenv npm package, which may need to be installed. Use ESM. Also create a .env file and and example file and put REPLICATE_API_TOKEN in both of them. Also update the README with a section about how to set up the environment. Make sure the code actually works. And if there are some existing lines in the code that are similarupdate them instead of adding duplicates.
joules.author: human
